trans-unit.source: Enables colors and color gradients to be associated with aspects of the elements and shell bars used in the Windows Workflow Designer user interface.
Gets the beginning color for the color gradient of the annotation background.
The beginning color for the color gradient of the annotation background.
Specifies the beginning color key for the color gradient of the annotation background.
This field is constant.
